author: Igor Kononenko and Edvard Simec and Marko Robnik-Sikonja
title: Overcoming the Myopia of Inductive Learning Algorithms with RELIEFF
window: This corresponds to the estimates by RELIEFF with very large number of nearest hits/misses. To test the effect of the normalization factor in eq. (3) we run RELIEFF also on one well known medical data set, ` primary tumor ', described in 6 THE AUTHORS??? Section 5.3.
